mentionedBy.name: JFrog Ltd.
mentionedBy.notes: Primary competitor to JFrog Artifactory. Open source repository that supports many artifact formats including Docker, Java, and npm. Can publish and retrieve versioned apps and their dependencies in CI/CD pipelines.

2025.note: Primary competitor to JFrog Artifactory. Open source repository that supports many artifact formats including Docker, Java, and npm. Can publish and retrieve versioned apps and their dependencies in CI/CD pipelines.
